Class BusRoute

java.lang.Object
  BusRoute

public class BusRoute
extends java.lang.Object

The BusRoute class models Rapid bus routes. Each bus route has a name and a list of stops.

Constructor Summary
BusRoute(java.lang.String name)
          Creates a new bus route with a name.

removeAllStops

public void removeAllStops()
Originally, if the user found the nearest stop more the once during a single session, the stops would be added to the vector, without the old ones being removed. This resulted in constant vector growth. This method will remove all the previously known bus stops, and add the new ones, saving space.
